title: Pre-K Services
text: Have teachers with the education and expertise to teach young children; the teachers have a degrees in Early Childhood Education and are Pa. State certified. Uses the High Scope Curriculum to help your child grow, academically and socially. Parent/Teacher conferences to discuss the childâ€™s progress with the Work Sampling Assessment tool. Help you and your child adjust to pre- school and make a smooth transition to Kindergarten. Offers a small classroom of 20 children so that your child can get plenty of one on one time with the teachers.
